verses.1: Hih bang teng khit ciangin Job in thugen hong kipan a, mihingin a pian ni a samsia hi.
verses.3: “Ka suah ni le ‘Pasal naungek khat kipaii hi,’ a kicih zan bei mang hen!
verses.4: Tua ni khimzin ni suak hen! Van a Pasian in phawkin nei kei henla, tua ni-in khua vak taang kei hen.
verses.5: Khua niim, khua mial in khuhcip hen. Tua ni-in meiipi zing henla, tua ni awkin valh tum hen.
verses.6: “Tua zan, khuamial sahpi in mancip hen! Kum khat sunga nidangte tawh kisim khawm kei henla, kha khat sunga nidangte lakah kiseh khawm kei hen.
verses.7: Tua zanin ta piang kei henla, lungdam otna awging tua zanin ging nawn kei hen.
verses.8: Phuisamna tawh Awle a khiim thei, a mitphial tawh tuipi ganhing a hencip thei mite in tua zan samsia tahen.
verses.9: Tua ni zingsang aksite mial hen. A vak ngei lo ding khuavak ngak niloh henla, zingsang phalvak mu ngei kei hen;
verses.10: bang hang hiam cih leh kei hong kipaiina naugil na khakcip lo a, keiʼ muhna panin lungkhamna hong hepkhiatsak lo hi.
verses.11: “Bang hangin a sisa-in suak hoh lo a, bang hangin ka suah phetin si pah hoh lo ka hi hiam?
verses.12: Bang hangin ka nuʼ khuk tungah hong kitawi se a, ka nuʼ nawi hong kiteepsak se ahi hiam?
verses.13: Tua hi zenzen kei leh hanah nuam takin ka lum hithiat khin ding hi. Sihna sungah ihmu-in ka tawlnga khin dinga,
verses.14: inn hoih nono a lam kumpite le uliante,
verses.15: ngun le kham tawh a kidim a hau a liante tawh nuam takin hanah ka tawlnga khinta ding hi.
verses.16: Bang hangin a hun cing lo-a suakte bang, khuavak a mu man loin a si naungekte bangin hong kiseelcip hoh lo ahi hiam?
verses.17: Tua lai ah migilote in hong su kha nawn lo dinga, a gim mite tawlnga hithiat ding hi.
verses.18: Tua lai ah galmat salte in nopna ngah dinga, nasem ukpaʼ awging za nawn lo ding uh hi.
verses.19: Tua lai munah mi lian mi neu om khawm a, silate nangawn a topaʼ kiang pan suakta hi.
verses.20: “Bang hangin lungkhamna a thuak mipa, a nuntakna haksa a sa mahmah mipa,
verses.21: sih ding lunggulh ngeungau napi, a si thei lo, sum phum zon sangin sih ding a lim zon zaw,
verses.22: han sung a tun ciangin a nuam mahmah, hankhuk a tun ciangin nuam lua-in a diang gawp mite, khuavak a mu dingin mi-in piang laizang ahi hiam?
verses.23: Bang hangin mailam thu ding a thei lopi-in a mot om ding, a kimkot ah Pasian in daai a khaknelh mipa, mi-in piang zenzen ahi hiam?
verses.24: Bang hang hiam cih leh khuisatna, ka annek suak a, ka tauna, luipi ging bang hi.
verses.25: Ka kihtaktak thu ka tungah hong tung ta a, ka laulau thu, ka tuak ta hi.
verses.26: Lungnopna, daitakin omna, ka nei kei hi. Lungkhamna in hong nawk niloh a, tawldam hun ka nei kei hi,” a ci hi.
